div.p: HIGH TECH WHEELCHAIRS FOR THE WOUNDED VETS.
LINDA, YOU ARE A PATRIOT. AND FINALLY, THE TIP OF THE DAY
AS WE MENTIONED IN THE STOSSEL SEGMENT, MOST BELIEVE THAT THE
USA HAS BECOME A MEAN COUNTRY, AND THEY SPECIFICALLY ASKED
ABOUT FOX NEWS. 52% SAID IT IS CIVIL, 32% SAID
IT WAS NOT. NOW IF YOU TAKE ME OUT OF THE
EQUATION, 75% WOULD GET CIVIL. I AM THE PROBLEM AS STOSSEL
POINTED OUT. NEXT TIME THEY SHOULD ASK THE
QUESTION WITH O'REILLY OUT OF THERE, AND BACK TO THE TIP OF
THE DAY, THAT IS IT FOR US. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
